title: Pianoforte
medium: Papier-maché, verre eglomisé, aluminum, and mother-of-pearl with modern upholstery
provenance_text:
Private collection, Las Vegas, Nevada, October 2006- September 2010
Sold by Sotheby's, London, The Great Exhibitions Sale,October 31, 2006, lot 553.
Martin Levy, H. Blairman and Sons, Ltd., London, 2004-2006
Sold by Christie's, London, February 11, 2004, lot 431.
Sold by Christie's, Glasgow, May 22, 1996, lot 217.
Exhibited at the Paris Exposition Universelle, 1867
Made for George Meason, St. Margaret's Lodge, Twickenham, England, c. 1865
